document.full_text: a new study estimates that the number of high-net-worth individuals in china -  mostly first-generation entrepreneurs who have more than $1.5 million -- will grow to 585,000 this year.
document.title: ranks of the rich growing in china
lines_and_colors: a new study estimates that the number of high-net-worth individuals in china -  mostly first-generation entrepreneurs who have more than $1.5 million -- will grow to 585,000 this year.
